full_threads.body:
Hi Glen,

We sent through dummy forms to test them and the submissions were received by customerservice@mayohardware.com.au

It may just be the auto-acknowledgement form that was received… I am not too sure. Can you please ensure that those are set up to be received by the person who has submitted the form?

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au



http://www.mayohardware.com.au/



0408 331 966



Customer Service: 1300 360 211

Hi Bonnie,

Just to clarify, We’ve only used one email address for ATG – FREE Glove Trial Registration Form and ATG – Glove Trial Evaluation Survey: atg@mayohardware.com.au. That’s the only one we’ve entered, so I’m not quite sure what’s meant by “remove the customer service email.”

The screenshot below is the current setup of most of the forms with the ATG email.
@glen please let Bonnie know and confirm

Hi, @andy

Just to clarify, I’ve only used one email address in the setup: atg@mayohardware.com.au. That’s the only one I’ve entered, so I’m not quite sure what’s meant by “remove the customer service email.”

The screenshot below is the current setup of most of the forms with the atg email.

Actually - I take that back, site not in blogvault.

Here is how to update (@victoriaV can do with access) or @glen if easier. Thanks team.

@allieB - I got this. Will record video too for next time.
Hey @joel , @glen needs your assistance for gravity forms in here 🙏

full_threads.body: hey @glen here is Bonnie's feedback 🙏

Hi Allie,

One more thing… Can you please remove the customer service email from receiving the below forms. They should only go to the ATG email.

https://mayohardware.kinsta.cloud/atg-free-glove-trial-registration-form/

https://mayohardware.kinsta.cloud/atg-glove-trial-evaluation-survey/

We have also found that the auto-acknowledgement emails are being sent to customer service, instead of the person who submitted the form. Can you please ensure the acknowledgement/confirmation email is sent to the email address entered in the forms. This applies to ALL forms.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au



http://www.mayohardware.com.au/
